itemInfo.itemDesc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Helrick Talisman.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Helrick Talisman of Destruction, Helrick Talisman

item.name: Bronze Ingot
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Copper and Tin together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Pure Copper Crystal
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Copper Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fine Thin Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying raccoon, monkey, or weasel hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Powder of Darkness
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: There’s a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Helrick Talisman
item.desc: A talisman with a magical gemstone embedded in it.

item.name: Grade 1 Weapon Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 1st-grade weapon upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Helrick Talisman of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Helrick Talisman.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Helrick Talisman of Temptation, Helrick Talisman

item.name: Helrick Talisman of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Helrick Talisman.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Helrick Talisman of Destruction, Helrick Talisman

item.name: Helrick Talisman of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Helrick Talisman.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Helrick Talisman of Crimson Flame, Helrick Talisman

item.name: Helrick Talisman
item.desc: A talisman with a magical gemstone embedded in it.

item.name: Ultimate Helrick Talisman
item.desc: A Helrick Talisman developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Helrick Talisman of Crimson Flame, Helrick Talisman of Destruction, Helrick Talisman of Temptation, Helrick Talisman
